timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-11-15T16:36:08", "sender_email": "haziqahmedrumzy@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "mahmudul.h@amberstudent.com", "subject": "Re: Your Enquiry In London!", "message": "hi,\\n\\ndo you know when this accomodation will be available for booking?\\n\\nthank you,\\n\\nhaziq\\n\\nOn Fri, 14 Nov 2025 at 10:20\u202fAM, <[mahmudul.h@amberstudent.com]()> wrote:\\n\\nHi Haziq\\n\\nWe hope this email finds you well!\\n\\nThank you for contacting [amberstudent.com]() and providing us with the opportunity to assist you in booking your ideal student home.\\n\\nYour reference number is #11154924409.\\n\\nI am Mahmudul, your booking manager for London. It is my pleasure to help you book the accommodation as requested.We take care of the entire paperwork and rental agreement on your behalf. Nothing would delight us more than providing you with a hassle-free booking experience :)\\n\\nIf you have any questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to us via Call / Email / Whatsapp or let us know a suitable time to contact you. We look forward to your response and the opportunity to assist you further.\\n\\nAdditionally, we are delighted to introduce our referral program. You can earn $50 for each friend you refer to us. You can visit [http://amberstudent.com/refer]() to refer them.\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nMahmudul H\\n\\nSenior Operations Associate\\n\\nPhone: [+447897026561]()\\n\\nWhatsapp: [+447782694334]()\\n\\nEmail: [mahmudul.h@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "hi, do you know when this accomodation will be available for booking? thank you, haziq On Fri, 14 Nov 2025 at 10:20 AM, <mahmudul.h@amberstudent.com> wrote: Hi Haziq We hope this email finds you", "direction": "inbound", "sender_type": "student", "agent_email": "mahmudul.h@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "haziqahmedrumzy@gmail.com"}

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: This is the vodafone voicemail service 407-90-10283. Please leave a message after the tone. When you finish recording, please hang up or press the hash key for more options.
Speaker B: Hi, I'm speaking with Hazik Ahmed Rumsey. Hazik, this is Hussain. I'm calling regarding your accommodation. I'm calling from UCL accommodation portal powered by Ambus Student. Could you please call me back on this number? Or you can revert me on your WhatsApp. I will be dropping your WhatsApp to you so we can help you out with your accommodation search. Thank you so much. Have a great day ahead.
